author: Tjeerd Ytsma

changelog.release_notes:
- Don't know where to ride? Use 'surprise me' to show routes nearby.
- Select your and your friends favourite segments from Strava.
- Show a preview of each route on the phone.
- A lot of other small improvements.
First beta version of Koers. Enjoy and let me know what you think.
First beta version of Koers. Enjoy and let me know what you think.

description:
Explore new roads with your Pebble: select a GPS route on your phone and start riding. Quickly select existing routes nearby, routes and segments from you and your friends on Strava. Or import a route in GPX or TCX from your favourite route builder.

Features:
- Course navigation on Pebble: show current location on your route.
- Show distance and direction to route when not on screen.
- Map rotation based on heading (default) or device orientation.
- Offline import of GPX and TCX files. iOS only
- Search for existing routes nearby you.
- Connect with Strava to select routes, activities and segments.
- Show current speed and time.
- Turn backlight always on.

You can try KOERS for free while in beta.
KOERS has proven its practice for me on the bike, let me know if you find it useful during your activities.
